mapper.insert: INSERT INTO balance_ota_info ( software_version, a_version_file_url, a_version_crc, b_version_file_url, b_version_crc ) VALUES( #{balanceOtaInfo.softwareVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balanceOtaInfo.aVersionFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balanceOtaInfo.aVersionCrc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balanceOtaInfo.bVersionFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balanceOtaInfo.bVersionCrc,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
